content:
There are many brands that make good UV protective sunglasses. Here are a few that are known for their quality:

1. Oakley: Oakley offers a range of sport and lifestyle sunglasses that provide excellent UV protection. 2. Maui Jim: Maui Jim uses PolarizedPlus2 technology in their lenses which blocks 100% of all UV rays. 3. Ray-Ban: Ray-Ban offers a variety of classic and trendy styles that provide 100% UV protection. 4. Costa Del Mar: Costa Del Mar is known for their polarized sunglasses, which not only provide complete UV protection but also help to reduce glare. 5. Smith Optics: Smith Optics makes a variety of sunglasses that offer exceptional protection and are specifically designed for outdoor sports like hiking and fishing. It's important to note that quality sunglasses with proper UV protection can be expensive, but investing in a good pair can help improve your visual comfort and protect your eyes from long-term damage.
